## Research Focus Areas

::: {.feature-grid}
::: {.feature-card}
### RAG Enhancement
Improving retrieval-augmented generation through advanced techniques including fine-tuning, quantization, and dimension reduction via random projection and sketching methods.
:::

::: {.feature-card}
### Semantic Intelligence
Innovating semantic search capabilities with metadata augmentation, developing novel semantic chunking methodologies for optimal context preservation.
:::

::: {.feature-card}
### Graph RAG & Agentic Systems
Exploring Graph RAG architectures for complex reasoning tasks and their integration into autonomous agent frameworks.
:::

::: {.feature-card}
### Performance Optimization
Optimizing numerical software and ML systems for computational efficiency, focusing on memory-efficient training and inference techniques.
:::
:::
